testcase.name: Guest user watching a product
testcase.system-out: Given I search for a product "oneplus 5t"...................................passed And I sort the search results by "Highest Price"............................passed When I select the "first" available product.................................passed And I watch the product.....................................................passed And I enter my credentials to sign in.......................................passed And I close the sign in page................................................passed And I press back button.....................................................passed And I want to print first "2" search results................................passed
